source.d41bb8ed: # tqdm progress bar usage ('21. 6. 15 updated ) - There are two ways to use tqdm package by Environments - [On the local Environment] : import the package like ### 'from tqdm import tqdm' - [ On the Jupyter Notebook Environment ] : import the package like ### 'from tqdm.notebook import tqdm as tqdm_nb'
